histogram.name: CryptAuth.ClientAppMetadata.IsManufacturerEmpty
histogram.summary: Indicates whether or not the device manufacturer name returned in the hardware info is empty. Recored during the construction of a ClientAppMetadata proto.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.ClientAppMetadata.IsModelEmpty
histogram.summary: Indicates whether or not the device model name returned in the hardware info is empty. Recored during the construction of a ClientAppMetadata proto.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.ClientAppMetadataInstanceIdTokenFetch.Result
histogram.summary: Indicates the result of fetching an InstanceId token during the construction of a ClientAppMetadata proto messages.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.ClientAppMetadataInstanceIdTokenFetch.Retries
histogram.summary: Counts the number of times the InstanceId token fetch got retried because it did not match with the expected InstanceId. Logged during the construction of a ClientAppMetadata proto message.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSync.Result
histogram.summary: Indicates success of performing a DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncService.ClientAppMetadataFetch.AsyncTaskResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async ClientAppMetadata retrieval performed during initialization of the DeviceSync service. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncService.ClientAppMetadataFetch.ExecutionTime
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async ClientAppMetadata retrieval performed during initialization of the DeviceSync service. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncService.GcmRegistration.ExecutionTime
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of GCM registration performed during initialization of the DeviceSync service. Recorded when the async callback is invoked.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncService.GcmRegistration.Success
histogram.summary: Records the result of GCM registration performed during initialization of the DeviceSync service. Recorded when the async callback is invoked.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncService.Initialization.ExecutionTime
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the DeviceSync service initialization. Recorded each time the DeviceSync service starts up, after initialization succeeds.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncSoftwareFeaturesResult
histogram.summary: Indicates that there was no issue retrieving supported and enabled software features, or that there were enabled features which were not in the supported feature set. See the histogram "CryptAuth.DeviceSyncSoftwareFeaturesResult.Failures" for a breakdown of failures by feature type.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncSoftwareFeaturesResult.Failures
histogram.summary: Breaks down by feature type "CryptAuth.DeviceSyncSoftwareFeaturesResult"'s count of enabled features which were not in the supported feature set.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceActivityGetter.ApiCallResult.GetDevicesActivityStatus
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async GetDevicesActivityStatus API call to CryptAuth during multi-device setup. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceActivityGetter.ExecutionTime.GetDevicesActivityStatus
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async GetDevicesActivityStatus API call during multi-device setup. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceNotifier.ApiCallResult.NotifyGroupDevices
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async BatchNotifyGroupDevices API call to CryptAuth. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceNotifier.ExecutionTime.NotifyGroupDevices
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async BatchNotifyGroupDevices API call to CryptAuth. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.AsyncTaskResult.DeviceMetadataDecryption
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async device metadata decryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Records a success if the operation did not timeout; a separate metric, CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.MetadataDecryptionSuccess, tracks individual encryption failures.Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.AsyncTaskResult.GroupPrivateKeyDecryption
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async group private key decryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.ExecutionTime.DeviceMetadataDecryption
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async device metadata decryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.ExecutionTime.GroupPrivateKeyDecryption
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async group private key decryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.IsGroupPrivateKeyConsistent
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the group private key sent by CryptAuth matches the existing group private key when they are expected to agree. Emitted during a CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync if the group private key is not being rotated.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.IsLocalDeviceMetadataConsistent
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the local device metadata agrees with that sent by CryptAuth in the SyncMetadata response. Emitted during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow, after device metadata is decrypted.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.MetadataDecryptionSuccess
histogram.summary: Records whether or not device metadata sent by CryptAuth in the SyncMetadata response was able to be decrypted. Emitted during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow for each device metadata packet.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.DeviceSyncer.MetadataParsingSuccess
histogram.summary: Records whether or not device metadata sent by CryptAuth in the SyncMetadata response was able to be parsed from a decrypted serialized byte string into a proto. Emitted during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow for each device metadata packet.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.ApiCallResult.GetFeatureStatuses
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async BatchGetFeatureStatuses API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.CorrectNumberOfDevicesInResponse
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the expected number of devices were sent in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response. Emitted when a BatchGetFeatureStatuses response is received from the CryptAuth server.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.ExecutionTime.GetFeatureStatuses
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async BatchGetFeatureStatuses API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.IsDuplicateDeviceId
histogram.summary: Records whether or not a device ID in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response has been seen already in the same response. Emitted for each device in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response. Emitted when a BatchGetFeatureStatuses response is received from the CryptAuth server.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.IsKnownFeatureType
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the feature type strings returned in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response are known feature types. Emitted for each feature type for each device in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response. Emitted when a BatchGetFeatureStatuses response is received from the CryptAuth server.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.IsUnsupportedFeatureMarkedEnabled
histogram.summary: Records whether or not a feature is marked as enabled even though it is listed as unsupported. This should never happen. Emitted for all feature types, for each device in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response. Emitted when a BatchGetFeatureStatuses response is received from the CryptAuth server.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusGetter.WasDeviceInResponseRequested
histogram.summary: Records whether or not a device in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response was included in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses request. Emitted for each device in the BatchGetFeatureStatuses response.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusSetter.ApiCallResult.SetFeatureStatuses
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async BatchSetFeatureStatuses API call to CryptAuth. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.FeatureStatusSetter.ExecutionTime.SetFeatureStatuses
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async BatchSetFeatureStatuses API call to CryptAuth. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.ApiCallResult.ShareGroupPrivateKey
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async ShareGroupPrivateKey API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.AsyncTaskResult.GroupPrivateKeyEncryption
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async group private key encryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Records a success if the operation did not timeout; a separate metric, CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.EncryptionSuccess, tracks individual encryption failures. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.EncryptionSuccess
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the group private key was able to be encrypted using a device's encrypting key. Recorded during the ShareGroupPrivateKey phase of the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded for each device with whom we intend to share the group private key.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.ExecutionTime.GroupPrivateKeyEncryption
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async group private key encryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.ExecutionTime.ShareGroupPrivateKey
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async ShareGroupPrivateKey API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.GroupPrivateKeySharer.IsEncryptingKeyEmpty
histogram.summary: Records whether or not a device's key used to encrypt the group private key is empty. If the key is empty, the group private key cannot be encrypted and shared with the device. Recorded during the ShareGroupPrivateKey phase of the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded for each device with whom we intend to share the group private key.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.InvocationReason
histogram.summary: The clients' reasons for making CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync requests. Recorded when a DeviceSync is requested.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ApiCallResult.FirstSyncMetadata
histogram.summary: Records the result of the first async SyncMetadata API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ApiCallResult.SecondSyncMetadata
histogram.summary: Records the result of the second async SyncMetadata API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.AsyncTaskResult.GroupKeyCreation
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async group key creation during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.AsyncTaskResult.LocalDeviceMetadataEncryption
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async local device metadata encryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ExecutionTime.FirstSyncMetadata
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the first async SyncMetadata API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ExecutionTime.GroupKeyCreation
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async group key creation during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ExecutionTime.LocalDeviceMetadataEncryption
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async local device metadata encryption during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.ExecutionTime.SecondSyncMetadata
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the second async SyncMetadata API call during the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.IsDeviceMetadataPacketValid
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the device metadata packets sent by CryptAuth have all of the necessary fields populated. Emitted for each device metadata packet during the SyncMetadata phase of the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.MetadataSyncer.IsDuplicateDeviceId
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the device ID from a device metadata packet sent by CryptAuth in the SyncMetadata response has the same ID as a packet from the same response. Emitted for each device metadata packet during the SyncMetadata phase of the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync flow.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.RemoteDeviceProvider.NumV1Devices
histogram.summary: Records the number of devices returned by a v1 DeviceSync. Only recorded when v1 and v2 DeviceSync are running in parallel. Only recorded if a v1 and v2 DeviceSync has ever previously occurred. Emitted when v1 and v2 devices are merged together, which occurs after either a v1 or v2 DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.RemoteDeviceProvider.NumV2Devices
histogram.summary: Records the number of devices returned by a v2 DeviceSync. Only recorded when v1 and v2 DeviceSync are running in parallel. Only recorded if a v1 and v2 DeviceSync has ever previously occurred. Emitted when v1 and v2 devices are merged together, which occurs after either a v1 or v2 DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.RemoteDeviceProvider.PercentageOfV1DevicesReplacedByV2Devices
histogram.summary: Records the percentage of devices returned by a v2 DeviceSync that replace their v1 counterparts. This will only occur if the v2 device has a decrypted public key that matches a v1 device. Only recorded when v1 and v2 DeviceSync are running in parallel. Only recorded if a v1 and v2 DeviceSync has ever previously occurred. Emitted when v1 and v2 devices are merged together, which occurs after either a v1 or v2 DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.RemoteDeviceProvider.PercentageOfV2DevicesWithDecryptedPublicKey
histogram.summary: Records the percentage of devices returned by a v2 DeviceSync that have a decrypted user public key. Only recorded when v1 and v2 DeviceSync are running in parallel. Only recorded if a v1 and v2 DeviceSync has ever previously occurred. Emitted when v1 and v2 devices are merged together, which occurs after either a v1 or v2 DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.RemoteDeviceProvider.RatioOfV2ToV1Devices
histogram.summary: Records the ratio of the number of devices returned by a v2 DeviceSync to the number returned by a v1 DeviceSync. Devices returned by a v2 DeviceSync should be a subset of the devices returned by a v1 DeviceSync, barring any race conditions. This ratio should be greater than or equal to PercentageOfV1DevicesReplacedByV2Devices because a v2 device can only replace its v1 counterpart if it has a decrypted public key. Only recorded when v1 and v2 DeviceSync are running in parallel. Only recorded if a v1 and v2 DeviceSync has ever previously occurred. Emitted when v1 and v2 devices are merged together, which occurs after either a v1 or v2 DeviceSync.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.Result.DidDeviceRegistryChange
histogram.summary: Indicates whether or not any device data in the device registry changed as a result of the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync attempt. Recorded when a DeviceSync attempt finishes.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.Result.ResultCode
histogram.summary: The CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync attempt results broken down by result code. Recorded when a DeviceSync attempt finishes.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.DeviceSyncV2.Result.ResultType
histogram.summary: Indicates whether the CryptAuth v2 DeviceSync attempt succeeded, failed, or finished with non-fatal errors. Recorded when a DeviceSync attempt finishes.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Enrollment.Result
histogram.summary: The top-level result of the CryptAuth device enrollment process.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.ApiCallResult.EnrollKeys
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async EnrollKeys API call to CryptAuth during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.ApiCallResult.SyncKeys
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async SyncKeys API call to CryptAuth during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.AsyncTaskResult.KeyCreation
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async key creation call during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.ExecutionTime.EnrollKeys
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async EnrollKeys API call to CryptAuth during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.ExecutionTime.KeyCreation
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async key creation call during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.ExecutionTime.SyncKeys
histogram.summary: Records the execution time of the async SyncKeys API call to CryptAuth during the CryptAuth v2 Enrollment flow. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.InvocationReason
histogram.summary: The clients' reasons for making CryptAuth v2 Enrollment requests. Recorded when an enrollment is requested.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.Result.ResultCode
histogram.summary: The CryptAuth v2 Enrollment attempt results broken down by result code. Recorded when an enrollment attempt finishes.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.Result.Success
histogram.summary: The success or failure of CryptAuth v2 Enrollment requests. Recorded when an enrollment attempt finishes.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.EnrollmentV2.UserKeyPairState
histogram.summary: The state--at system start time--of persisted user key pairs, generated during CryptAuth v1 and/or v2 Enrollment: whether they exist and if they agree. Recorded on CryptAuth v2 Enrollment manager construction.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.FeatureType
histogram.summary: Records the multi-device feature type sent in a GCM message from CryptAuth v2. Emitted when a GCM message with a feature type key/value pair is received from CryptAuth.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.IsDeviceSyncGroupNameValid
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the DeviceSync group name sent in a GCM message from CryptAuth is valid. Currently the only valid group name is "DeviceSync:BetterTogether". Emitted when a GCM message with a DeviceSync group name key/value pair is received from CryptAuth.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.IsKnownFeatureType
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the multi-device feature type sent in a GCM message from CryptAuth v2 is recognized by the Chrome OS client. Emitted when a GCM message with a feature type key/value pair is received from CryptAuth.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.TargetService.AreTickleTypeAndTargetServiceBothSpecified
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the CryptAuth TargetService was specified in a GCM message by both the CryptAuth v1 registration tickle type key/value pair as well as the CryptAuth v2 target service key/value pair. Both key/value pairs should not exist in same GCM message. Emitted when a GCM message is received from CryptAuth.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.TargetService.FromRegistrationTickleType
histogram.summary: The CryptAuth TargetService--Enrollment or DeviceSync--indicated by the registration tickle type key/value pair of an incoming GCM message. The registration tickle type is used in GCM messages sent by CryptAuth v1. Emitted when a GCM message from CryptAuth is received.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Message.TargetService.FromTargetServiceValue
histogram.summary: The CryptAuth TargetService--Enrollment or DeviceSync--indicated by the target service key/value pair of an incoming GCM message. This key/value pair is used in GCM messages sent by CryptAuth v2. Emitted when a GCM message from CryptAuth is received.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Registration.AttemptTimeWithRetries
histogram.summary: The time it takes the GCM driver to return the result of a GCM registration request made by the CryptAuth GCM manager. CryptAuth registration with GCM is only performed once, if successful, for a given user on a device as the first step in CryptAuth v1 or v2 Enrollment. Recorded when the CryptAuth GCM manager is notified by the GCM driver that the registration attempt finished, successfully or not. The GCM driver might quietly retry failures before notifying the CryptAuth GCM manager. The time recorded here encompasses the possible retry attempts and delays from the GCM driver.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.Gcm.Registration.Result
histogram.summary: The result code from a GCM registration request made by the CryptAuth GCM manager. CryptAuth registration with GCM is only performed once, if successful, for a given user on a device as the first step in CryptAuth v1 or v2 Enrollment. Recorded when the CryptAuth GCM manager is notified by the GCM driver that the registration attempt finished, successfully or not. The GCM driver might quietly retry failures before notifying the CryptAuth GCM manager. This metric will not include results codes that were quietly retried by the GCM driver.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.InstanceId.DidInstanceIdChange
histogram.summary: Indicates whether or not the Instance ID used by the CryptAuth client differs from the previously retrieved ID. Recorded while fetching client app metadata if a previous ID has been set.

histogram.name: CryptAuth.InstanceId.DidInstanceIdTokenChange
histogram.summary: Indicates whether or not the Instance ID token used by the CryptAuth client differs from the previously retrieved token. Recorded while fetching client app metadata if a previous token has been set.
